name: @parcellab/js-plugin-utils
description: Utils for using the parcelLab js plugin with different frameworks (react/vue)

scripts.unsafe-build-vue: npx vue-cli-service build --target lib src/v3/vue/index.vue && npm run prepare:vue-v3
scripts.unsafe-build-vue:v5: npx vue-cli-service build --target lib src/v5/vue/index.vue && npm run prepare:vue-v5

author: @andruschka
